thread.title: Mid Devon Gazette published LIVE: Commissioner Alison Hernandez grilled by Mid Devon District...
thread.title_full: Mid Devon Gazette published LIVE: Commissioner Alison Hernandez grilled by Mid Devon District...

author: Mid Devon Gazette
title: Mid Devon Gazette published LIVE: Commissioner Alison Hernandez grilled by Mid Devon District...
text:
Comments (0) 
Mid Devon District Councillors are set to grill Devon and Cornwall Police Crime Commissioner for the South West Alison Hernandez this afternoon. 
Gazette reporter Helen Edworthy is live blogging what her responses are on a range of questions from cyber-crime, to Brexit, and the future of policing in Mid Devon and across the South West. 
Councillor Jonathan Smith will also bring up the controversial subject concerning the alleged criminal fraud which Hernandez was questioned about following the election for her post. 
As well as questions to the commissioner, other topics up for discussion include a report regarding the slurry pit near Templeton which residents have complained is making them ill and the issue of homelessness across Mid Devon.
